item.title: Mean Girls 2024 Ending Explained
item.description: The new Mean Girls film is both an adaptation of the 2004 classic movie and the 2017 stage production, providing a new, updated ending for viewers.

item.title: All 12 Sylvester Stallone Movies From The 1980s, Ranked
item.description: Sylvester Stallone was one of the biggest movie stars of the 1980s, whose filmography during this decade had more to offer than just Rock and Rambo.

item.title: Maggie Q And Samuel L. Jackson's 64% RT Action Movie Is Shockingly Underrated And Should’ve Been The New John Wick
item.description: The Protégé redirects many of the classic run-and-gun tropes, and Maggie Q's strong performance demonstrates why it should've been the new John Wick.
